title: Authenticating Issues
body: Been trying to log in for the last 30 minutes or so and all it does is keep "authenticating" anyone else having this issue? I just want to play some League on my day off from work. Everything else is working fine, its not my internet connection or my permissions to League already checked all that.

replies.body:
Having lots of issues.  From screening not loading properly to game not starting after pick selection.  To game locking up during pick selection.  Now having issues with logging in.    Currently waiting for game screen to load, but last wait didn't load until game ended.

Ive rebooted three times.   Nothing else on my network is having any issues.  =/
I am also having this issue with league alone.
I'm also having this problem... haven't been able to play league and i'm starting to have withdrawal symptoms. What can i do to fix this?
It looks like some NA players were having some ISP issues earlier.  Is everything okay now?
Still having issues, i posted on another thread about this as well, Have you found out anything?

The ISP issues were resolved quite a bit ago.  If you're having issues authentication, a network problem could be causing a block so  I recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure firewall settings.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to rule out a few more possibilities and get back in.
I have been trying to sign on for 12 hours. Comcast internet. I can play ALL other games I own except league.

yea, the issue is not resolved. There are several people that still are having this problem. Aside from that, there WAS an issue with the ISP's as you just mentioned. You can't say that its coincidence that i am still having issues and its problems on my end, after playing league for years and not having any connection issues whatsoever.

I don't think they've been resolved. Quite a few people still have the same issue (I do as well). EVERY other game I play works just fine except for league. Nothing is wrong with my internet connection.
I am also having this same issue. It does not appear to be on my end, because I am able to play other online games just fine.
I'm having this issue as well.
